quotes.name: Jon Snow
quotes: If I fall, don't bring me back.

quotes.name: Sansa Stark
quotes: I hate the king more than any of them.
No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

quotes.name: Catelyn Stark
quotes: Laughter is poison to fear.

quotes.name: Jaime Lannister
quotes: The things I do for love.

quotes.name: Tyrion Lannister
quotes: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.
The day will come when you think you are safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.
That's what I do: I drink and I know things.
A Lannister always pays his debts.

quotes.name: Cersei Lannister
quotes: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.
If you want a whore, buy one. If you want a Queen, earn her.
Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs.
The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy.
I want our baby to live. Don't let me die, Jaime. Please don't let me die.
I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.

quotes.name: Aerys II Targaryen
quotes: Burn them all!

quotes.name: Daenerys Targaryen
quotes: I am the dragon's daughter, and I swear to you that those who would harm you will die screaming.
He was no dragon. Fire cannot kill a dragon.
All men must die, but we are not men.

quotes.name: Ramsay Bolton
quotes: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.

quotes.name: Arya Stark
quotes: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.
Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.
Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.
Fear cuts deeper than swords.

quotes.name: Samwell Tarly
quotes: I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no reason to be afraid.

quotes.name: Brienne of Tharth
quotes: All I ever wanted was to fight for a lord I believed in. But the good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.

quotes.name: Melisandre
quotes: The night is dark and full of terrors.

quotes.name: Ygritte
quotes: You know nothing, Jon Snow.
Every man must die, Jon Snow. but first, he must live
